messages.content: What is Extraverted Feeling?
Extraverted Feeling, or Fe, is one of the four cognitive functions related to decision-making and judgments. It's distinct from Te or Fi, being more aligned with Ti or introverted thinking.
What happens when an Fe user engages their function?
When an Fe user engages this function, they can empathize with and absorb the feelings of others, particularly Fi users, leading to outward displays of care.
How do ESFJs demonstrate Fe?
ESFJs, known as supporters, are prime examples of Fe users who are exceptionally caring and self-sacrificing. With Fe as their hero function, they exhibit high levels of care and support.
What about ISFJs and Fe?
ISFJs, with Fe in the parent slot, also demonstrate significant caring tendencies.
Where do Fe users derive their sense of self-worth from?
Fe users, like ESFJs, derive a sense of self-worth from caring for others. When this opportunity is taken away, they may feel diminished.
How do Fe users view their own self-worth?
Fe users' use of their self-worth, also known as Fi, is in the lower part of their mind, and they kind of look at their self-worth with a negative connotation all the time.
What is extroverted feeling's relationship to guilt?
Extroverted feeling is the function where people feel guilt. If you want to make someone feel guilty, you just tell them they make you feel bad.
How do INFJs behave in relationships regarding caring?
INFJs demand to be in the caring position in relationships, and if this opportunity is taken away, they feel guilty and get emotional. INFJs often make others feel guilty.
What happens to depressed INFJs or ISFJs?
With the rise of depression, INFJs or ISFJs may even resort to self-harm due to consistent feelings of guilt.
Are Fe users easy to take advantage of?
It's very easy to take advantage of an FE user. FE parents and FE heroes, especially FE heroes with their self-sacrificing nature, can be taken advantage of.
What happens when Fe users are taken advantage of repeatedly?
Eventually, FE users will either cut you off completely or become so bitter.
How is the ENFJ different from other Fe users?
The ENFJ, although caring, is constantly worried about their self-worth.
What's the difference between Fe and Fi users?
Fe users can empathize with and absorb the feelings of others, particularly Fi users, leading to outward displays of care. Fi users are more internally focused on what they personally value.
Can an ESFJ become vengeful?
An ESFJ might cook you a meal that's been poisoned or laced with parasites as a way to get back at you.
What do ENFJs and INFJs particularly value?
ENFJs and INFJs, as mentors and sages respectively, particularly value being recognized and feeling gratitude.
What's the nature of the extroverted feeling function?
The extroverted feeling function is like a child that just wants to give balloons and candy to everybody. It's about giving and making others feel good.
Why is helping fellow FE users so exhausting?
Helping fellow FE users is extremely tiring because they take it so personally, and their pride gets involved. It becomes a whole thing.
What major issues do FE users struggle with?
FE users have major pride issues and struggle with covert contracts, like scratching each other's backs without discussing the terms. They expect reciprocation without being explicit about it.
What emotion is extroverted feeling associated with?
Extroverted feeling is about guilt, making them feel bad. That's the core negative emotion tied to Fe.
How do you make FE users feel amazing?
To make FE users feel amazing, show them gratitude. That's what they're really after.
What do FE users desire from people they've invested in?
FE users desire recognition, gratitude, loyalty, and special treatment from those they have invested in. They want to know their investment mattered.
How important is praise for Fe users?
Praise is highly valued, especially for those with Fe in the hero or parent slot. They really need that recognition.
Which types feel guilty by default?
ESFJs and ENFJs often feel guilty by default. Guilt is a common emotion for Fe users in general.
What should you avoid doing to TE users?
It's crucial to steer clear of embarrassing or humiliating TE users, as TE is associated with feelings of humiliation and humility. That's their emotional weak spot.
What happens when one FI user feels down in a room full of expert feelers?
If a room full of expert feelers encounters one FI user who is feeling down, the entire room's mood can shift negatively as the expert feelers absorb and reflect those emotions. They all catch it.
What's an Fe loop?
There are Fe loops where everyone is trying to make each other feel better. It's as bad as a Te loop where everyone is trying to make each other smarter.
What's the solution to these Fe and Te loops?
People just need to calm down and understand their cognitive functions. That's the way out of these loops.
What's important to prevent with Fe users?
It's crucial to prevent Fe users from feeling guilty. That's the emotion you want to keep them away from.
